security_group_id.description: Security group to apply this rule to.

from_port.description: Start port (or ICMP type number if protocol is `icmp` or `icmpv6`).

to_port.description: End port (or ICMP code if protocol is `icmp`).

protocol.description: Protocol. If not icmp, icmpv6, tcp, udp, use the protocol number

self.description: Whether the security group itself will be added as a source to this ingress rule. Cannot be specified with `Cidr Blocks`, `Ipv6 Cidr Blocks`, or `Source Security Group Id`.

source_security_group_id.description: Security group id to allow access to/from, depending on the type. Cannot be specified with `Cidr Blocks`, `Ipv6 Cidr Blocks`, or `Self`.

cidr_blocks.description: List of CIDR blocks. Cannot be specified with `Source Security Group Id` or `Self`.

ipv6_cidr_blocks.description: List of IPv6 CIDR blocks. Cannot be specified with `Source Security Group Id` or `Self`.
